description: They pointed out that Singapore's new strategy plays to the country's strengths such as its state-of-the-art infrastructure, effective governance and good education system. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: National AI strategy will position Singapore to be a global leader in the field: Experts
title_page: National AI strategy will position Singapore to be a global leader in the field: Experts | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - Singapore's national plan to harness artificial intelligence (AI) technologies for social and economic benefits will position it to be a regional and global leader in AI, experts told The Straits Times.
They pointed out that Singapore's new national AI strategy, which was announced on Wednesday (Nov 13) by Deputy Prime Minister Heng Swee Keat, plays to the country's strengths such as its state-of-the-art infrastructure, effective governance and good education system.
